verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1361>isn't<s%> haughty, nor my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7311>lofty;<s%> nor do I <S%H1980>concern<s%> myself with great <S%H1419>matters,<s%> or things too wonderful for <S%H6381>me.<s%>

Surely I have <S%H7737>stilled<s%> and <S%H1826>quieted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> like a <S%H1580>weaned<s%> child with his <S%H517>mother,<s%> like a weaned <S%H1580>child<s%> is my soul within <S%H5315>me.<s%>
